sentences.sContent: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.sCn: 那所佛教寺院位于市郊的最西北角。

sentences.sContent: Why not escape city noises and enter the peace of outskirts with our weekend trip?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why not escape city noises and enter the peace of outskirts with our weekend trip?
sentences.sCn: 为什么不参加我们的周末旅行，走出城市的喧闹，步入郊外的宁静呢？

trans.tranOther: the parts of a town or city that are furthest from the centre
